description: An intelligent MySQL MCP Server with expert data analytics capabilities and comprehensive caching. Goes beyond basic querying to provide in-depth database analysis, relationship mapping, and user behavior insights with high-performance caching system.

capabilities.name: mysql_query
capabilities.description: Execute a read-only SQL query against MySQL databases. Supports SELECT, SHOW, DESCRIBE, and EXPLAIN statements.

capabilities.name: mysql_schema
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive schema information including tables, relationships, constraints, and data patterns.

capabilities.name: mysql_analyze_tables
capabilities.description: Analyze table relationships and suggest optimal query patterns for user behavior analysis.

capabilities.name: mysql_inventory
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive inventory of all configured MySQL hosts and their accessible databases.

capabilities.name: mysql_cross_host_query
capabilities.description: Execute queries across multiple MySQL hosts and combine results for comprehensive analysis.

capabilities.name: mysql_discover_analytics
capabilities.description: Intelligently discover and analyze database structure with expert data analytics insights. Use summary mode first for large servers.
